parts.text: {"word":"organization-sponsored","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"組織が後援する、組織が主催する、組織が支援する","english_definition":"Supported, endorsed, or funded by an organization.","examples":[{"sentence":"The event was organization-sponsored, ensuring high-quality resources and speakers.","translation":"そのイベントは組織が後援していたため、質の高いリソースと講演者が保証されていた。"},{"sentence":"We attended an organization-sponsored workshop on leadership development.","translation":"私たちは組織が主催するリーダーシップ開発に関するワークショップに参加した。"},{"sentence":"The research project is organization-sponsored, providing funding and expertise.","translation":"その研究プロジェクトは組織が支援しており、資金と専門知識を提供している。"}],"collocations":["organization-sponsored event","organization-sponsored program","organization-sponsored research","organization-sponsored initiative","organization-sponsored activity"],"synonyms":["sponsored by an organization","funded by an organization","supported by an organization","organization-backed","organization-led"],"antonyms":["independently funded","self-funded","privately sponsored","unsponsored"],"notes":"This term is used to describe activities, events, or programs that receive support from an organization, which can include funding, resources, or endorsement. It indicates that the organization is officially involved and responsible for the initiative to some extent."}],"etymology":{"value":"Combines 'organization' (a structured group of people working together) with 'sponsored' (supported or funded).","notes":"The term indicates that an organization provides the support or sponsorship."},"pronunciation":{"ipa":null,"syllables":"or-gan-i-za-tion-spon-sored"},"inflection":{"notes":"This is an adjective and does not change form based on tense or number."},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Organization-sponsored' is commonly used in formal contexts, such as business, education, and non-profit sectors, to indicate official support from an organization. It implies a level of credibility and accountability due to the organization's involvement.","examples":[{"sentence":"The university offers several organization-sponsored scholarships.","translation":"その大学はいくつかの組織が後援する奨学金を提供している。"},{"sentence":"The conference featured organization-sponsored presentations.","translation":"その会議では、組織が後援するプレゼンテーションが行われた。"}],"common_mistakes":null,"related_words":["organization","sponsor","sponsored","corporate-sponsored","government-sponsored"],"level_frequency":null,"readability_explanation":null,"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The organization-sponsored charity run raised thousands of dollars.","translation":"組織が後援するチャリティーランは何千ドルもの資金を集めた。","type":"example","meaning_category":"後援する"},{"sentence":"Our team participated in an organization-sponsored training program.","translation":"私たちのチームは組織が主催する研修プログラムに参加した。","type":"example","meaning_category":"主催する"},{"sentence":"The organization-sponsored study aims to improve public health.","translation":"組織が支援する研究は、公衆衛生の向上を目指している。","type":"example","meaning_category":"支援する"}]}
